name: id
description: Must be **unique** across the domain of your service (as the expanded state of individual instances of the component persists across page loads using [`localStorage`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/localStorage)). Used as an `id` in the HTML for the accordion as a whole, and also as a prefix for the `id`s of the section contents and the buttons that open them, so that those `id`s can be the target of `aria-labelledby` and `aria-control` attributes.

name: headingLevel
description: Heading level, from 1 to 6. Default is `2`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the accordion.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the accordion.

name: items
description: An array of sections within the accordion.

params.name: heading.text
params.description: The title of each section. If `heading.html` is supplied, this is ignored. This is used both as the title for each section, and as the button to open or close each section.

params.name: heading.html
params.description: The HTML content of the header for each section which is used both as the title for each section, and as the button to open or close each section.

params.name: summary.text
params.description: Text content for summary line. If `summary.html` is supplied, this is ignored.

params.name: content.html
params.description: The HTML content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed.

params.name: expanded
params.description: Whether the section should be expanded upon initial load or not. Defaults to `false`.
